fiftyone.mobile.detection.matchers.finalmatcher
Class Matcher

java.lang.Object
  fiftyone.mobile.detection.matchers.finalmatcher.Matcher

public class Matcher
extends Object

Class containing the final matcher algorithm to calculate which device out of those found is the best match to a User Agent.

Version:
2.2.9.1
Author:
51Degrees.mobi

Constructor Detail

Matcher

Method Detail

matcher

public static Result matcher(String userAgent,
                             Results results)
Examines each string in the list to find the one that has the highest number of initial matching characters. If only one is found this is returned. If more than one have the same number of matches are found further analysis is performed on the non matching parts or string tails.

Parameters:
userAgent - User Agent to be found.
results - List of possible devices to match against.
Returns:
The closest matching result.

matchTails

private static Result matchTails(String userAgent,
                                 int pos,
                                 List<Result> results)
Compare the tails of the devices using the Edit Distance algorithm.

Parameters:
userAgent - User Agent to be found.
pos - position in String that denotes when all remaining devices differ from the User Agent.
results - List of possible results to match against.
Returns:
The closest matching result.
